last_episode_to_air.name: 15 March 2004
last_episode_to_air.overview: 24 Oras is a Philippine television newscast show broadcast by GMA Network. Originally anchored by Mel Tiangco and Mike Enriquez, it premiered on March 15, 2004 replacing Frontpage: Ulat ni Mel Tiangco on the network's Telebabad line up and worldwide on GMA Pinoy TV.
